doc.field: Series II: Inspirational People and Collaborators
Series II: Inspirational People and Collaborators

This series consists of materials related to important collaborations Montano has fostered throughout her career and lifetime. Key collaborators include Annie Sprinkle, Dr. Mehta, Dr. Mishru, Mitchell Payne, Pauline Oliveros, and Tehching Hsieh. Material in this series reflects Montano's performance art/life process, blending the personal with the professional. It includes correspondence, photographic material, research, notes, collaborative works, and press and promotional material.
